name: auto-model
description: This script creates, from a given train dataset, an OptiML, a Fusionwith its best models, and a dataset with the predictions for the test dataset

inputs.name: optiml-id
inputs.description: OptiML id from previous executions, to bypass the creation of the resource. (e.g. optiml/5cd15343eba31d247a0009a7)

inputs.name: num-of-models
inputs.description: Number of models to include in the Fusion (default: 5)

outputs.name: output-dataset
outputs.description: Dataset with the final predictions from the test-dataset

outputs.name: output-optiml-id
outputs.description: OptiML created from the given train dataset

outputs.name: output-fusion-id
outputs.description: Fusion model created from the top models of the OptiML

outputs.name: evaluation-id
outputs.description: Evaluation of the Fusion model using the validation-dataset
